adviseScripts.text: Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Neon keeps yelling out "Firepower!" every time she sees me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: But my name is not firepower.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Maybe she doesn't know my name?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: She's just a nut for firepower.
She may not have memorized your name yet. You should repeat it to her more often.
Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Then, she does know my name!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: That's a relief.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: But, I know Neon's name...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: When I see her, I'll keep repeating my own name.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Marian about the correlation between Neon and firepower.
I was hungry, so I ate some food from the fridge.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Then, Anis got really mad at me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Apparently, what I ate belonged to her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: So... does everything in the fridge belong to Anis?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
Wow! She must be so rich!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Now that I know, I'll be asking her for more freebies!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: What is that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: But then, how can you tell what's hers and what isn't?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Should I just ask the food who it belongs to?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I teach Marian how to discern which food items belong to Anis.
Every time I play around in the flour,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Rapi just sighs and turns away.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Is she sick or something?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Maybe her head hurts.
The problem isn't her head. It's her heart.
Really? That's a big problem!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: We should get a bandage for her head, then!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Can we... put a bandage on her heart?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I don't know how to make her feel better.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Marian and I talk about Rapi, concerned for her.
Commander. I will protect you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I won't fail you this time!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Huh? ... Why did I say "this time"?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Did I... fail to protect you before?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: No. You've always protected me.
This time, I'll protect you.
Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: What's that sad look on your face?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Don't do that. You'll make me sad, too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: What? No! I should be the one who protects you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Oh! That's it! We can protect each other.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: How about it? I think it'll work out great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Marian, thinking about a time long since passed.
Neon keeps teasing me because I like bandages.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: She says if I like them so much, I should be a mummy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: What should I say to her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Dress up as a mummy and scare her.
Cover her in bandages.
No, thanks! Being a mummy sounds like a real hassle.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I don't want to scare her, either.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Anis says getting scared is bad for your heart.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Cover her in bandages...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Yeah! That way I'd have another friend who loves bandages!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Nice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I spend some enjoyable time together with Marian thinking about Neon.
Commander, do you hurt anywhere?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: My leg has been hurting since last night.
Nope.
Your leg hurts?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Oh, no! Oh, no!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Here, let me put a bandage on it for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: You sure?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Aww... I wanted to bandage you up...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: But then again, I guess it's good that you're feeling all right...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Marian and I play with bandages together.
It feels so good to live here in the Outpost!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Your room is the best of all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Rapi, Anis, Neon all live here... And you too, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Commander, what's your favorite place to be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: In the Commander's Room along with you.
Anywhere in the Outpost.
I like being there with you, too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: It's better than being by myself!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: You like the entire Outpost?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: You sure like a lot of places, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I talk about the Outpost with Marian.
Commander, which flavor do you prefer? Grape or apple?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Grape.
Apple.
Grape?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text:
I wanted to eat the grape one...
But you can have it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I like Commander more than I like grape Splendamin, anyway!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Really? You prefer apple?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: That's good.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: It's good because I want to eat the grape Splendamin myself!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: The apple Splendamin is all yours!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I spend time sharing some Splendamin with Marian.
Commander, what type person do you like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: The person in front of me.
That's a secret.
In front of you? You mean me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text:
I like you too!
Because you are warm and kind!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: You're the best!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Why is it a secret?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Is it something I shouldn't know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Marian about what type of people we are into.
Whenever I go up to the surface, I enjoy getting to see the bright blue sky.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: What kind of sky do you like, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: A blue sky, or the night sky?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Blue.
Night sky.
Same here!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I love to look at all the pretty clouds while the sun shines down on me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: The sunlight feels so warm. Just like you, Commander. That's why I like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I like the night sky too, when it's twinkling with stars.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: But, I prefer a bright blue sky.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Feeling the warmth of the sunlight on my skin always makes me think of you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I talk about the sky up on the surface with Marian.
Anis wants to shower together later.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to join us?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Absolutely not.
How come?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Is it because the shower stall is too small?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Commander, your face is beet red!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Are you sick?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Do you need a bandage?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: As we continued our discussion, I quickly changed the topic.
I'm afraid that won't be easy, Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Commander, you should turn back.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: ... Rapi?
What are you doing?
Correct!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I've been practicing talking like Rapi.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: How did it sound? Was I close?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I'm trying to talk like Rapi.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: How did it sound? Was I close?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I help Marian try to imitate Rapi's tone of voice.
Commander, could I have that pen that you're using?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Sure, I don't need it.
I'll buy you a new one.
Wow! Thanks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Neon says I might enjoy collecting.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I'm really fond of you, so I decided I'm going to collect things related to you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I don't want a new one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: It has to be a pen that you've used before...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Neon says I might enjoy collecting, so I've decided to collect things related to you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Marian listing off all the different items I've used.
I had a really weird dream last night.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: In the dream, you were pointing a gun at me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: And you weren't scared?
Then what happened?
Of course not!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I know you'd never shoot me, not even in a dream.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I can't remember the rest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: But I was happy to see you in the dream!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Hopefully I can see you in my dream tonight as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Marian and I talk more while recollecting some of our past dreams.
I was reading a book today, and it said that mermaids live in the ocean.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Have you ever seen a mermaid?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: No.
Mermaids only exist in books.
Maybe we'll be able to see one someday!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: According to the book, they have a beautiful singing voice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I really wanted to meet her. That's too bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Then do you think we can meet Snow White?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Marian and I have fun talking about different fairy tales.
Before I go to bed every night,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Rapi sings Twinkle Twinkle Little Star to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Do you listen to any songs before you go to sleep?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: The same song.
Tears, Love, Break up, And Sleep.
Wow, what a coincidence!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I can barely get to the end of the song before I'm fast asleep.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Twinkle twinkle little star...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Hmm, I've never heard of that one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I'll try and give it a listen one of these nights before I go to sleep!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Marian and I talk about other music that puts you to sleep.
Commander, let's play rock paper scissors!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: You have to choose one, or you lose!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Rock...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Paper...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Scissor!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Show scissors.
Don't show anything.
Shoot!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I lost.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Congrats, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Umm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Since you didn't do anything, does that mean I win?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: That's not very exciting...
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Marian and I spend some time playing rock paper scissors.
I really enjoy our discussions together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I'm happy to be talking with you right now!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Me too.
I'm glad that you are happy.
That makes me even happier knowing that you feel that way!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Today is just the best!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: How about you, Commander? Are you happy today?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I hope you're as happy as I am!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Marian and I have a great time talking to each other.
We all underwent some additional training a while ago.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Rapi came in first, but I was second!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Good job.
Try and finish on top next time.
Thanks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: But next time I want to be first.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: If I'm going to protect you, then I need to be stronger.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: I will!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: If I'm going to protect you, then I need to be stronger.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Marian and I talk about ways for her to get stronger.
Did you know if you shake a can of carbonated water
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: and then open it, it gushes out like a fountain!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: How do you know that?
I can't say I do.
Neon said that Anis is a big fan of water fountains,
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: so I shook up all the carbonated water we have in the fridge.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: When Anis opens them, it'll be like a fountain in her own home! She'll love it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Well... I just shook up all the carbonated water we have in the fridge.
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you go and try opening one up now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Marian

adviseScripts.text: As we ended our discussion, I started planning how to clean up the impending flood of carbonated water.
